title: pixely lag in game
body: this just started doing this today.. where multiple spots of the screen simaltaneously glitch and twitch. the scoreboard, the time, my ign, hp bar, all of it twitches and just completely lags me. even uninstalled and reinstalled. still doesnt work. i lowered the resolution to see if it was too high but i dont think that was the problem.. why now league? why?

replies.body: It could be that you need to update your graphics drivers to make sure your pc is able to correctly display everything, but this could in fact just be caused by damaged game files. Make sure to run the client repair through the client options, and then check for driver updates and check off the other steps listed in the [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting).

dude me too, iv'e tried everything. im having connection issues as well, you can use the sync option for detailed images, but it lags then, also it didn't do this till after that update, i played a few hours before it and it ran fine
